text: Thun () is a city of the administrative district of Thun in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. The city has about 43,783 inhabitants (around 90,000 in the agglomeration), as of 31 December 2013. It is located where the Aare flows out of Lake Thun (Thunersee), 30 km (19 mi) south of Berne. ==Gallery== File:Thun.JPG|Thun File:4197 - Thun - Schloss Thun over Rathausplatz.JPG|Castle Thun over City Hall Square File:Aerial image of Lake Thun (view from the east).jpg|Lake Thun ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website of the city of Thun *
title: Thun
